export var toggleArrayElement=function toggleArrayElement(array,value,true_false){var index=array.indexOf(value);if(true_false){// value should exist in array now
if(index===-1){array.push(value);}else{}}else{// value should not exist in array now
if(index===-1){}else{array.splice(index,1);}}return array;};// https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19269545/how-to-get-a-number-of-random-elements-from-an-array/38571132#38571132
export var getRandomSubArray=function getRandomSubArray(arr,n){var result=new Array(n);var len=arr.length;var taken=new Array(len);if(n>len)throw new RangeError("getRandom: more elements taken than available");while(n--){var x=Math.floor(Math.random()*len);result[n]=arr[x in taken?taken[x]:x];taken[x]=--len in taken?taken[len]:len;}return result;};
